ROM.Changelog: *GPS Fixed partially *Stablity fixes *Lags fixed *Bump Dot version to v1.2 *Merged to December Security patch *More visual bug fixes *QS tiles track color accent in Dot O theme. *Dot pixel theme has been made to have the same O white feel except with no QS tiles tint. *Added Network Indicator (Settings->Data Usage). *Added Changelog section inside About. *New settings icons. *Re-work on overall app icons. *Some new dope walls. *And many more bug fixes and performace enhancements *add 4k uhd recording and mode
